subject: Remove unused ToneComparison component and fix color usage
body:
- Removed ToneComparison.tsx (no longer used in the app)
- Fixed error message text color in join.tsx (text-text instead of text-accent for better readability)
- Color distribution now follows semantic pattern:
  - Primary (blue): interactive elements
  - Secondary (magenta-pink): attention/alerts
  - Accent (teal): positive status indicators
title: Remove unused ToneComparison component and fix color usage
